lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons. Tonight's gonna be a fun one. But before we jump into it--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What does that mean? What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know. We ended on an interesting note.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I just peed a little.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do y'all hear that heartbeat in your ears?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heartbeat noise) But before we get to that, let's go ahead and get to our opening announcements. First and foremost, our glorious returning sponsor for the evening, our friends at Loot Crate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic, awesome people. Sam, is there something you want to talk about?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if I'd go that far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But one thing that has been lacking is a sense of spectacle. Of human achievement. Of record breaking. So tonight I'm going to attempt something that's never been attempted before. I'm going to do the Loot Crate copy read here. While drinking an entire Coca-Cola.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And a bite-sized 100 Grand bar, Snickers bar, Milky Way, Twix, another bite-sized Snickers bar, a Reese's Peanut Butter Cup, and a packet of Big League Chew.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, all this stuff melted in my car.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Notice he's got a towel down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god! He does have a towel down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two minutes, can it be done? The answer is no. (laughs) Ready?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Loot Crate is a curated collection of awesome items from the best pop culture franchises delivered to your door every month. You get the best and most exclusive licensed figures, t-shirts, home goods, and more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're doing good. You're doing good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let it happen! Let it happen!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we're good. It's better. It's better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This week's crate theme is Primal. Featuring awesome swag from X-Men, Overwatch and Predator.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give yourself every month or give the gift of geeking out to a friend or loved one. And if you visit lootcrate.com/criticalrole and use the coupon code 'criticalrole', you'll get 10% off your Loot Crate monthly geek crate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From collectibles [inaudible]. It's like Comic-Con in a box!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy! How do I separate the gum from the other stuff? Loot Crate, Loot Crate DX, Loot Gaming, and Loot Anime. How do you want to do this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you do it? Did he just do it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam, get that shit out of your mouth. I'm going to throw up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't do it! I can't do it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten! Nine! Eight! Seven! Six! Five! Don't stop fighting for it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No matter what, we're going to think less of you, it doesn't matter anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it! That's it! That's it! Oh my god, that's it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get a participation ribbon. Well done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was so fucking gross. Samuel!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have an ambulance on standby?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to remind you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If there was ever a moment in our show that will be giffed and show up on GIPHY, that's it right there. Thank you, Sam. And thank you, Loot Crate, for your fantastic sponsorship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like we just passed into performance art, there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't forget to use the code 'criticalrole' for 10% off your Loot Crate monthly geek crate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to throw up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I feel like that's an opening act to Gaga's next tour.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listen, real art makes you uncomfortable and challenges you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Super Bowl was missing that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That made my eyes water and not in a good way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a part of the back of my head that's cramped.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well done. Yeah, not even thinking a little bit about the game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just roll it up and burn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It only has one more day, and they wanted to make sure we would let you guys know this for the last day they have going, so be sure to go to nerdist.com/powerrangersgiveaway to learn more about this and enter to win if this sounds like an awesome thing to you. If one of you guys wins, that's great, 'cause then we have just more and more of our community winning everything, which is kind of our long-term plan, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next up. Merch. Laura, do we have any updates on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (muffled) Aw man, I put food in my mouth!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck are you thinking? What're you thinking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quick, drink the Coke! Ten, nine, eight, seven--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have one while she swallows.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The distance on that was incredible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on, Marisha. Are you okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why are we not talking about this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sounded like something that happens when you're diseased.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I could feel your glycogen spike from over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, isn't that nice? And pleasant? And not disgusting-looking? It's a 24-hour twitch stream. There's gonna be a lot going on. There's gonna be Gather Your Party, AXYB special, there's gonna be Game the Game, and we're going to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I saw Breaded Men, I was very excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the charity stream is benefiting 826LA.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Yes. And the whole thing is gonna be charity-related, it's all gonna go to 826LA.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our friends there since the beginning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, so donate, we're gonna be taking donations, it's gonna be great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. And tomorrow at noon Pacific Time, me and Darren De Paul are gonna be guesting on Eric's TBD RPG, the Doctor Who RPG, from noon to 3PM tomorrow Pacific, and then--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put him in the game so you can kill him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see. Laura, now that you're--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we have our Gilmore shirt, we got our Strongjaw shirt, we got a 'How do you want to do this' shirt, with the hoodie. We got baseball caps, we got patches, we got vinyl stickers, which I am still a really big fan of. They go on windshields, Macbooks, whatever you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So yeah, check it out if you wanna wear your Critical Role goodies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're like an Italian grandmother in Hoboken, New Jersey right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moving on. The new Signal Boost came out, with Jason Charles Miller as the host, our friend who played Garthok for his temporary run during the initial Conclave attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He is part of the Clasp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And he did our theme music.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did our theme music for the show, here, he's a very talented musician. And a good friend of the show. And you can see his new run on Signal Boost this week. New GM Tips is out today. My second-to-last on the run at this time. This episode is more for the players, and deals with creating and running characters that are against the normal tropes and the type that people generally fall into when creating a new character in an RPG. So go check it out, see if any of it seems to resonate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is how he criticizes us now, is he makes a little web video and sends it to all of us instead of talking to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But I'm glad you finally did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, it turns out I have to record voice over on occasion, so Wednesday Club is not going to be me this week and I'll be talking to comic books to the engineer who will be mildly irritated with me. But instead, you guys, Matt Key is going to be hosting and he is going to talk about his favorite thing in the world.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- his wife, and Doctor Strange, but that's cool, too. Because him and his wife.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, oh yeah, and his wife. And Doctor Strange.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And Doctor Strange, his work wife.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We thought it was for all of us but then we realized it was just for Matt and Marisha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's physically beautiful but just the process we saw outlined is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is absolutely brilliant, and undeserved and very happy to find a very wonderful place in our home to fill it with awesome nerdy shit. Thank you guys. All right, I think that's the end of our announcements. That being the case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back. So, picking up where we left off this last episode, Vox Machina had made their way west into the Ozmit Sea, to the islands of Anamn and to the city of Vesrah, the final stop in Keyleth's long-running Aramente. To prove herself leader of her people of Zephra. Here they were given a task, as part of the Aramente, where they had to retrieve three lodestones within the rift of the water elemental plane, which as of late had been taken up residence by a kraken, an ancient pet of the Titans, now freed and left to wander, to feed, grow, and apparently loom across that boundary. The party went in and, due to an unfortunate vomiting episode underwater, drew the attention of the kraken.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That you were almost vomiting today, and you vomited and ruined our lives?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just plan to vomit every week. At least once.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's for the best, I think. However, drew the attention of the kraken, and a very, very intense battle ensued, in which most of you managed to escape by the skin of your teeth, however, in the battle, Vax did fall, his body left cold and lifeless beneath the waters. In a last-minute urge of leadership, Keyleth reached out, grabbed the twins, and Planeshifted back into the prime material plane, with Percival, Taryon, and Grog looking to escape. You managed to be vomited up with, apparently, almost no hit points left, and jumped through the portal while flicking off the kraken as--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that was where we left off. So. Before we get into this--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But what is your destined thread to be?" Grog, as you come jumping through the portal and turn to flick off the kraken, you watch as one of its tendrils begins to-- one of its final tentacles that's still there pulls through and begins to try and grab one of the sides of the rock lodestone pillars.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other guardians, half merfolk, half various individuals, rush forward and begin stabbing at it, as it begins to get its beak snapping right at the interior of this portal. You see it starting to flex and the energy beginning to pulse, it's almost trying and force its way through a much smaller opening. Percival, Grog, Taryon, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit. We have to do stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all are still underwater, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guardians right now are just shouting and screaming and stabbing at the tentacle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yells) A lot of that? There's a lot of just open-mouthed (yells)?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the guard's like, "Argh! Quick! Push it back!" They're all stabbing it. The one tentacle finally snaps and withdraws inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could just go, we could just leave, it's just fine. It's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The mouth pulls back, and now the whole body shifts over, and you see the one giant eye from one side of the kraken come peering through--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am dragging Taryon-- and you, if I can drag you as well-- we're walking away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The eyeball's soft, let me throw one more time at the eyeball. Yeah, I throw the hammer at the eyeball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reckless. Okay, so you had disadvantage underwater, so it's just one roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I meant two-handed. Oh no, I'm throwing it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21 points of damage. I'm still enlarged, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. Whack! As you release the hammer, it goes Thor-style just head-first, piercing through the water, and (impact sound) into the open eye of the kraken as it slams shut. You hear the (groan) as it reels back and the voice pierces through the rift towards you and most of the people in the vicinity one more time, saying, "I'm coming soon enough." And as it pulls back, the remainder of the guardians go ahead and reach over, each putting hands on the lodestones, and shift them slightly in place, and you watch as the rift crackles and then doesn't slam entirely shut, but the image you had of the water elemental plane suddenly grows a little more opaque and difficult to make out the discerning details.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, thank god. Well, we all give something every once in awhile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you're carrying the-- which you were--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. So, conscious, horribly beaten. It seems that the kraken has been beaten back, and currently the lode-stones are utilized to keep the rift in check. You're uncertain as to whether or not the threat of the kraken was an idle threat or whatever else it has planned, but regardless, that's the least of your worries.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would've been primarily to you, Grog, and some of the other guardians nearby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But he recognized true power and he was sorry to see us go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you've had this conversation, you turn and look to the left and you see Durent there who is waiting and goes, "Where is the rest of them? Where's the rest? Where's Keyleth?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we breathe some air? Please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all get up for a minute and think about your circumstance. Vex, you look down and you see your brother, face-down in the water, floating.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I flip him over and look at him. Vax! Vax, wake up!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on. Come on. We have to get him out of this environment. Come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a cleric on the island?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Before I do anything, I am going to throw up a Sky Write above the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They'll get the idea. Hold on to him. Get on. I am going to turn into my giant raven form again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like the giant eagle form. I just kind of modify it for style.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so using the stats of a giant eagle but you're going into a raven-type form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I fly off towards the center of the city, towards where the entrance of the portal was, 'cause I'm assuming there would be sages and clerics waiting there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the portal is beneath the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know but there is like a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is the central chamber in the middle of the city, which is where it seemed the base of where the social gatherings seemed to occur. And the centerpiece was where Uvenda and many of the other keepers of the city seemed to frequent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you watch as the giant raven takes off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, I'm holding onto her, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're holding onto her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's holding onto him and we're riding there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're used to flying under your own power usually, not somebody else's. But as the wings take off, the sea breeze, thankfully, is not too heavy that day. And as you coast in, coming down, dodging between the various buildings heading towards the central risen chamber. You watch as the upper, third-tier level of this, there's a single chamber that is open and the outside wall is a series of pillars that makes up the structure. On the inside, you can see it dips down into three different sunken platforms, and in the center there are a handful of small statues, there's incense being burned, and what looks to be a small altar of some kind. There are four figures there inside, all dressed in similar blues and greens, aquas and whites, most of them are just long robes with dangling shell-based jewelry, and various smoothed-off stones that have been found tossed and rounded by the elements through the years. And in the center of the chamber, in the process of lighting a few of these, you're not quite sure of the material, but they appear to be candles, as you see they're being lit like candles. You see Uvenda is walking with her staff, taking this long burning tube, and is currently setting them alight as you approach. As the wings of the raven begin to prepare for landing, the wind kicks up in front and you see some of the other guardians put their arm up and look up curiously. Some of them reaching back and preparing for whatever may be there. Uvenda's voice however rings out across the center of this chamber and says, "Stop! Stop. I know this one who approaches." And as they all slowly back up, Uvenda stumbles upward, sets aside her small hand-based wick to one of the servants and approaches the raven as you begin to slink off the side of the bird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please! Are there any clerics here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We do have some here of a healing-based nature. Yes. Has he been hurt?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Runs her thumb along the cold skin. "Indeed. The kraken claims another."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. No, he won't claim him. What can we do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The power that is at our disposal could perhaps bring him back, though his form may be "different than you recall."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The feathers scatter off as Keyleth is now returned to her half-elf image.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have means of traveling quickly? We have a friend who is a cleric. Can you get us to her there and back quickly? Or someone who can Tree Stride me there and bring her back? I'm exhausted or else I would do it myself. Please? Please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have not a means of travel, but we could reach out to someone."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." And she walks back to the altar, and you can see where there are a series of these statues. There's four of them in the center and there's one large statue in the center. And the center statue, it looks almost like long-petrified reef. It's white, it's porous, it looks like the long-dead reef. But it seems to swirl into a tree-like shape. It's this weird merging of sea and forest-based imagery, and as each various portion of the tree outstretches, you see various baubles are hanging from it. You see stones, necklaces, notes. Uvenda sets her staff to the side and her small, slightly arched form begins to slowly crawl up the side of the tree, and it looks a bit physically arduous for her but nobody offers to help. You see that this is something that she's done often and is part of her job as the guardian here in Vesrah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While she does this, I come over the earpiece and I say, Grog, Percy, quick, get back up to the central tower. Quick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we even know they're alive?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am trusting that they are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the distance of the earpiece, you can hear them. Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh thank god. Thank god. Is everyone still alive down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're finishing the statement, you watch as Uvenda is climbing down with one hand and has something cradled in her left arm as she's like (grunts), almost slips for a minute and sets herself down back on both her feet and rubs her lower back. "You'll get there one day."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she unfurls her arm, and you can see there's a conch shell. A small conch shell, but a conch shell. And she goes, "Whoever you're wishing to speak to, think of them and whisper it into the shell."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike. Pike, if you can hear me, we need you, now, in Vesrah. Please, it's Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we know if it worked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, we offer the service still, should you not "hear anything. We are more than willing to try and restore him to whatever form we can."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much time does-- How long is too long?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to wait too long. Let's just wait a little while longer and see if we hear anything from Pike. She's very smart. She'll hear us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start brushing his hair off of his face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While she does that, I start gathering the feathers and start laying them out as a bed around Vax, and preparing the station.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the scattered remnants of your transformation, the raven feathers that were shunted from your form, you begin to form into a bed-like place to set his body on. Okay. While you guys are doing that, Durent finally breaks the surface of the water, where you were originally brought down into the Aerie of Torrent. And after you've all hit the surface and breathed out, the bright midday sun is coming down, the smell of sea air hits you. You hear the distant cawing of various ocean shore birds. It's a welcome change of pace from the murky depths of the water elemental plane you've been facing for the past few moments. As soon as you emerge, Durent steps up onto the sand, turns around, shakes and brushes his hair off. "All right. Well, that's the end of "my watch. I don't know what to do."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you point us in the direction of where your healers would be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's your best bet there. That's where Uvenda "is, at least. She can help you more than I do. I spend most of my time on the outskirts, "or down below."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Thank you for watching our backs in there, that was real hairy, but we have to be leaving you now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hope everything's okay." And he gives you a nod and steps over to the side and watches as you guys go, as he retrieves one of his Waverunner sailing boards, and watches with a look of intensity and worry on his brow, as his dark dwarven complexion vanishes in the distance. You guys approaching, rushing in towards the center of the city. As you begin to approach, you watch as Doty, who's been waiting patiently off to the side, comes up to you and is holding the book out, and starts thumbing through page after page after page.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, yes, Doty, thank you. I'll review this all later. How many pages did you fill?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes past about 25 different pages, in very very tiny script, that goes into detail about the tides going in, each person that went in and out of the water, anything he saw in the further distance, various birds from the sky. He does have a few spatterings of white bird excrement across the top of his armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems as proud as an automaton could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Very well done, Doty, thank you. We'll have much more to write tonight, so save some energy for that. Will you-- Will you carry me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually you guys come to the surface, you're immediately greeted by one of the guards who is on guard currently with one of their spears. And upon recognizing you, he kind of steps aside and lets you in, and that's where you guys watch as Keyleth and Vex are laying Vax down onto a kind of makeshift bed of black feathers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're there. You're still in Doty's arms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, down. What happened? What's going on? Is he dead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. This is what happens when you adventure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm waiting for Pike. She'll come.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But they're not good enough. Pike will come.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't care what he looks like. I just want him back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike will come. I don't want to do this without Pike. She'll come.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uvenda at this point is starting to gather some of the servants and they're starting to take down certain baubles and trinkets from the tree branches and setting them in a vicinity around, and as she does so she's like, "These represent protection of the waves." They take some small salts and kind of scatter them around. They're doing the best they can from a ceremonial standpoint to at least prepare a space. About 15 tense moments pass, as you all look out to the horizon, the sun now moving past its zenith and pushing into the afternoon portion of the day. The air is growing a little more hot. You find both the nerves, the stress, and the temperature of the room, all the light from the sun being reflected off the white stone, causing this kind of heated element of the interior and you instinctually begin to sweat and it's getting slightly uncomfortable. There is what sounds like a distant rumble of thunder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure. It just sort of seemed directionless.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is anybody else startled by it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all notice each other reacting to the sound and suddenly it happens again, but this time much closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uvenda's looking a bit awkwardly in the-- "Normal? No. But let us be cautious." As she takes her staff, her little elderly gnomish form kind of clutching it in front of her in a defensive standpoint.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run to my room and get my things. Have we had-- we have not had anything vaguely resembling a short rest at this point.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello everybody. I wish it were better circumstances. Okay, okay, okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Pike, the message came to you and you immediately went into a frenzy. You were in the process of carrying a bunch of food along with other volunteers within Emon, getting it to some of the folks that lost their homes. And when the voice of Keyleth hit your ears, you immediately dropped what you were holding. You found somebody to help to continue to lead this effort, and immediately rushed off to find the nearest temple of Sarenrae in Emon. Which still stands, slightly damaged, but it's still one of the buildings of the temple district that's fine. There, you sat in quiet prayer for a number of minutes just imploring to Sarenrae to offer you some sort of guidance or way. And you felt something around you shift, like a push, someone just kind of pushed you in the shoulders. And as your eyes opened, you weren't in the temple anymore. You were above a floor in a brighter, sunlit, unfamiliar place. And as you land and caught yourself, you can see-- You are in your astral form, much like in the Whitestone experience. And you turn around and see, surrounding you in the center of this open-air chamber in the center of this expansive ocean, your friends, their eyes locking to you with a look of sudden joy and despair mingled.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, thank Sarenrae. You heard. And I just run up and-- I was going to give her a hug, and then pat her astral form. I hug her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you still do some sort of resurrection?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I can. I think I can, I will try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How is this going to work with him and the Raven Queen? What do you know? Vex, do you know anything?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know. I've never done anything quite like this before. I mean, most of the time you guys have been there for resurrections, I don't know. I don't know. We just have to try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anything on his armor? Like, something we should be looking for? Like, a tab or a button or-- No?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look. For any sort of message from the Raven Queen on his armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, most of the runic symbols and designs on here aren't formulated in a sentence structure or language. You do see the roots of them. Some of them are Draconic in root, but they've been changed as part of the enchantment of the armor. However, you do find a small, crumpled note on the inside of the armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Do you want to tell her what's on it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you want me to tell her? It just says your name on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it says, "Take these wings and fly."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. No. I just put it back in the armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry to bring you into this so quickly, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, no, no. It's okay. I would rather be here, and I'm glad that you guys called me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're in your astral form, you don't have the reagents with you. However, reagents can be provided by the party. You rummage through, and you require a diamond of at least 500 gold piece worth, which you have at your disposal, so mark that off in the bag of holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who wants to bring the first offering to the ritual? The first attempt to bring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've brought so many of us back, but this feels different, right? I feel as if I'm not speaking to Vax, I feel as though I'm speaking directly to Her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will track him down, I will hunt him in whatever pit he resides, and we will destroy your enemy once and for all. What say you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who wishes to be the next offering?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vesrah. So I want to give you a little bit of light to follow in the darkness. And I find the scar on his back of my handprint. And I find it and I cast Daylight into his back, into the hand print and say, and besides... You know I'm in love with you, right? (quietly) That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20 and add your wisdom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. (whispering) Come on, come on, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the Daylight spell brightens, your instinct is to close your eyes, but you push against it, and you know this will temporarily burn to your retinas but you still, holding that still--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --whispering into him. You can feel, not just the tears of your emotion but the instinctual pain of the blinding light piercing the inside of your eyes, but you hold strong as you whisper to him and as the final word leaves your lips, the second portion of the glyph grows alight and then transitions to that same purple-blue color. At which point, the Daylight spell diminishes in a way that you weren't expecting. As opposed to being this bright, glowing, blasting beacon, it shrinks down to a small condensed gentle glow, and you're afraid to move your hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go, then. I go over to Vax. Is he on a raised platform?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, actually, he's on the ground in a bed of black feathers and currently is propped up against Keyleth's chest. She's sitting behind him so he's leaning back against her, she has her hand against his back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, okay. (echoing cracks) Keyleth, it knocks him out of your grasp, the impact is so hard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just keep my hand-- come on, you have to be that hard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The body just kinda (boof) onto the side--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --you're like, oh god. You pick him back up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why is he taking a picture again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He always takes a picture, he always takes a picture. It's a thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fucking hell. Oh jesus, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all kinda close your eyes and blink it and the visions gone and you see all the servants around, still standing in the places they were just looking intently at Vax, their eyes still wide open and you watch as the limp, standing form there before you, the wings of black feathers slowly stretch out from his shoulders (crackling) and as they reach out and stretch and open, his head pulls back and (heavy breath) takes a breath of living air into his lungs and his eyes blink open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vesrah. You're alive. (laughs) Hey, that queen, she's pretty scary looking, huh?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you're not kidding, that's pretty intense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Welcome to my last four months.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is some physicality to her divine form. Pike feels like she's there, like she can be held and touched, but it's like touching a warm, soft Jello.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go and I give him a big 'ol hug. A Jello-y hug. Gloop!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or like a big piece of cotton. It's softer and gives a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take hold of the Jello head and press my head into it and say, thank you, sister.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I give him a cotton candy kiss on his forehead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In time." And it just fades and you can now see the sea beyond the midday of Vesrah now surrounding you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoa. Hey, I feel like shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, all that's left now is Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, by the way, your jaw is sore and you're pretty sure you're missing a tooth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, welcome back. Don't be weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Glad you're not dead. Really glad you're not dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you need to rest? Do you need to go lay down?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we all need to rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She's still kind of like, "Well. I'm glad to see that this was a success. That your "friend could come in aid as well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I pull mine out as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Oh, yes. I hereby present to you a lodestone that I got at the bottom of the sea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Good job, good job. Good work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She kind of points over and the servants come up and collect the three of them and she goes, "Well, this is fine news. I was worried that we had a loss, and perhaps this endeavor was "incomplete. However, it appears that you've both survived the encounter with the current scourge to "Vesrah's rift, and you've completed your Aramente, young Keyleth. There will be a "celebration tonight before we send you back to Zephra, "where you will be formally crowned by your father, Korren."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's happening tonight? Oh wow, this stuff moves fast, yeah

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll celebrate this evening. You'll return at your leisure, but--" And she kind of walks up to you, and she can see the tears, and she kind of reaches up with her wrinkled, sun-wrecked, elderly gnome skin. And reaches up and rubs the tears from your face and goes, "It's all right. You've done "well. And I'm sorry."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For a lot of things. The Aramente didn't used to be this dangerous. It's tradition, but our "trial has changed, and while we grew confident in your confidence upon arrival, we should've been "more attentive. This might not have happened."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. It was my negligence in proper planning that added to this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That may be the lesson learned at this trial. But I think we have learned a lesson as "well. And perhaps we need to adjust our trial, given the dangers "of our recent elemental guardian."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think the landscape of the world has changed a lot recently, and I think the Aramente should reflect that. So I would be honored to provide any insight to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, come back. Come back once you've returned to your people and become the Voice of "the Tempest. Then we may alter however you see fit. Anyway, glad you're awake!" Taps you on the head with the staff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many people lose their lives on their Aramente? How many people complete it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, the Aramente is generally not a lethal experience. The kraken only arrived this "recent generation, and honestly, the only two who's had to take it with the kraken's presence "were Keyleth and her mother."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd been hoping to run a perception check through pretty much this entire conversation, to make sure she's being completely honest about everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean? Why were we the only ones with the tools?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, before the kraken came to the rift, it was simply an excursion to gather the "lodestones amongst errant elementals and other mild dangers within the plane. The kraken had only "been drawn to the rift--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "-- recently. And unfortunately, Vilya was the first to take the trial "with it residing just beyond our door."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many people did she have with her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "None. Two of which were our own."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To exist among such ravaging elemental forces is "a danger unto itself. But that is the call of the Ashari by nature, is it not?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To safeguard the rest of civilization from these terrors. Anyway, enough dourness. It got "rather cold here and I think we could use some warming heat of the sun, some food and perhaps "some rest for you." Hits you again on the forehead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you mind if we take a brief respite amongst ourselves, before we catch up with you and join in the festivities?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But of course! It's--" And she looks at the sun. "It's about time for my sailing, so I'll see "you here in the next hour or two." And she goes, and two of her servants start flanking her down the stairway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She stops and turns, looking back at all of you, and gives a deep bow. "Kaitiaki." Continues to make her way down the stairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, me too? All right, okay. Sure, sure. This is natural, this is right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you talking about, 'who is that'?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That guy, who is that guy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you talking about, that is Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, come now. You recognize me. Taryon Darrington! The brave, the bold. We both fell in battle, so I know exactly how you feel right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't think it was published yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not quite yet, but I'm sure people are already talking about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, how did you do, Tary?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, as you look over, Doty has been faced away from the entire ritual and had been recording the various weather elements and surroundings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, no! We just witnessed an amazing ritual. Did you not get any of that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns the book around and you can see it talks about cloud structures, it talks about a few children that were playing in the water below.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 'Plagued by an incompetent plan and ambushed by a surprise from a kraken, we nevertheless stayed 'true to ourselves and to our bravery, found the lodestones and, despite nearly dying, came back to 'tell the tale, proving ourselves as heroes of Vesrah and to each other. I was aided by young 'Percival in my fight. Abandoned by the Antlers and the Elves. And by the end of the fight, it was 'just me and the big guy, duking it out. I blacked out for a moment, but before I did, I'm sure he 'saw my bravery and was impressed. That's why he dragged me to safety and presented me to Percival 'for healing.' That's enough for now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You forgot to mention the part where you vomited and blew our cover.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's right, you did do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not-- This is the abridged-- I don't want to bore the readers with too much detail.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's so weird. I totally remember walking past you and trying to leave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Somehow, I got to the rift door and I didn't get there on my own, so thank you. Thank you, Big Guy, for dragging me there. I appreciate it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Have I met-- I don't know-- My memory is not-- Who are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taryon Darrington. We passed briefly in Whitestone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, I didn't realize you were still with my family.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'll say, oh, you're friendly with these people as well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They've taken me in and they're showing me the ropes of adventure, and we've already done quite a lot. We were on a boat that was attacked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we almost died, but I destroyed the beast that was attacking us with a bit of magic.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How did you destroy it? Do tell me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a lot of tricks. Magical things that I think you might even understand, because it seems that you are a magic user yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The resurrection thing that you just did was amazing. I've never seen anything like it, and it was quite astounding for somehow who's not really here. Hello?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your hand (impact sounds) does actually hit the side of her face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And they're speaking this whole time in Gnome?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. This whole time, you've been hearing (talks Gnome).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, how is my accent? I haven't had a chance to practice Gnome on an actual gnome in a long, long time, since I was a boy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But it's nice to be able to speak it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I apologize profusely for butchering your language. I learned it by books, and, as I've said, I've only had a chance to speak it once before to a gnome who visited my family's estate a long time ago.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh? All gnomes know each other, so who was it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't catch the fellow's name.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was a fellow, that narrows it down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something happened in his room, he had to burn his bedsheets, and I think he got a new bed. I don't know quite what happened, but it was quite a dramatic thing. I was only about 12 or 13 at the time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That sounds like somebody that I would love tremendously.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, he had a sharp wit to him, and-- not very attractive young man, but--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He sounds very familiar. Like I said, us gnomes do know each other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really? And is it true that you live hundreds of years, and--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's something you should know. Yes, I should-- if you need to know anything, you should always ask me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will tell you all the truths.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will-- I was planning on doing at least one chapter in my book about the smaller races, and that would be an excellent--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well you-- you are, too. Pleasure to meet-- make your acquaintance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can feel free to smoke this fool, it's fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, that's fine. He's a little bit of a twat, isn't he?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't mind him, though. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So. As you guys take a little bit of time to go ahead and rest, recover, converse, and bask in--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm 98% relieved and 2% bummed that I--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I know the feeling, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. Who knows, it may still come up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does that mean?! We don't know what that means! You can't say that shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Raven Queen. Just kidding! (weird caw noise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's almost like future challenges in the story might involve more death, I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, a little disappointed, but this works well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have another giveaway from our friends at Wyrmwood tonight! I don't know what we're giving away, 'cause I was to give--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is made of wood and it is a dice tower.

lines.name: CREW
lines.text: We're running it up to you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's gonna be free to the winner! So, come on over to the Twitch chat, and get involved over the break. The word is raven, R-A-V-E-N.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and-- Yeah you are, Grog. Oh. Oh snap! That is not a dice tower--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sentinel box! Which is still rad. They told me it was a-- but however-- oh, that's cool! It has like a small magnetic-- must be for minis and-- or dice, if you want to. So that's pretty rad, actually. So anyway, this 'Bird's Eye Maple Sentinel Deck Box' is gonna go to whoever the winner is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you guys want to check it out, it's fundly.com/we-love-amandine A-M-A-N-D-I-N-E. If you can give anything, we're almost at the goal, which is awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, we have the winner in chat!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Bringing us back in. You guys have had some time to recover, gather your thoughts, gather your wits, and reflect on the recent near-permanent loss of your Champion of the Raven Queen, Vax'ildan. You now currently sit wherever you'd like within the city of Vesrah in preparation for an evening celebration. Is there anything you guys wish to do in the meantime?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much time has passed since I got brought back up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little over an hour, I'd say.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just out of curiosity, do my wings 'shloop' back in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are all together, if you wanna be, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we be on the beach?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be crafting little seashell necklaces or hair bits for everybody-- I've been working on a hair bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a hair bit, or like a hair bit that goes like this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like we've had this conversation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. As you're working on that, Vax, you do notice in this time that you see one of your sister's feathers that's kind of carefully braided into your hair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of. I've only got two of 'em and they're both in his hair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Both of your sister's feathers are braided into your hair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have something for you all. I have presents.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I had Gilmore help me out with a little something for if and when I completed the Aramente, as a thank you, so I got them from him before we left-- granted, in hindsight, I'm never holding onto presents ever again, 'cause we could all just die any day. But!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I had Gilmore enchant a very simple enchantment to each of them, so it won't-- you won't have to focus or attune to it--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- if any one of us goes unconscience-- unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If any one of us goes unconscious--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. The rest of them will start beating a little heartbeat. That way, we know if any one of us goes down, even if we can't see each other. So. Grog!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's wonderful, it's a little morbid and wonderful at the same time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Figure we all go unconscious so often--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm. Totally had this one made for Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I understand, and that's fine. I--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Think I should hold onto it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But here's a flower! And I Druidcraft him a flower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What a bummer! Oh, I feel like somebody that just got party invitations, it's like oh, I ran out!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I make sure Tary gets a little seashell crown. So.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, you can-- do you wanna wear it for now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do have to get him an earpiece.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're staring at the flower and contemplating the awkwardness, you feel Percival slowly come up behind you and just put a little seashell crown on your head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. My. God. Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there anyone else around, by the way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wanna check, are we being listened to? Is there anyone within earshot? Is there anything--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, maybe I should go ahead and just give this to Tary, I can always have Gilmore make another one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could always get it back from him if he decides to leave our presence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, there are folks wandering around, and there are some people that are kind of just younger folk--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could be safe, if he's---

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- or people that are general denizens of Vesrah that are just excited that all of a sudden these people came in and apparently battled a kraken and word has gotten around already--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just let him know it's to hold it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At least for now. I can probably have another made--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I drop to my knees. My lady,

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I knew this day would come, I didn't think so soon, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- I suppose, finding that lodestone and helping you on your 'acapakay'--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lay down on the sand and just close my eyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've watched you in these last few battles, and you have been powerful--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Powerful, confident, and enthralling, and I vow to use this to the betterment of our entire team, to make sure that none of us fall in battle, not me, not Percy, not you, not either of the elves, not short stuff or the big guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth, you have just passed the final challenge of your Aramente.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't take it back from him now. Or ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you put it on, Doty's hand goes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No-- wait 'til I find the light, find the light, find the light--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket goes up and pees on Doty's leg.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm imagining a really simple etch-a-sketch drawing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to move, I'll break the pose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Trinket, that's not a tree. That's a robot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty does not seem the least perturbed by it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Uh.. Keyleth, I've been thinking. What do you think the Aramente is supposed to teach?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've been thinking about that a lot myself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm regretting that I hadn't been thinking about it until today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just tell you to go back-- go out into the world and prove yourself a leader, with no real definition on what they think a leader should be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, they tell you to go out and gather a group of friends, and then thrust yourself into a death-defying situation that is likely to get people killed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is one way you could phrase it, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm-- and I don't mean to worry you-- just be cautious, I don't-- I have that nagging feeling, and I'm hoping it's wrong, but I think it is possible that they feel you did not lose-- you did not learn the lesson of the Aramente.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, that'll be a discussion that I have with Korren, with my father.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if the lesson is loss? What if you're supposed to go down there and watch people that you love die?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not barbaric! We're not-- no one wants to lose anyone on an Aramente.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The thing that defines the worst leader a people could have is a lack of empathy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think I'm not empathetic?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that they make sure their leaders might-- I think it's possible, I don't-- I'm nervous. I think it's possible that they make sure their leaders are empathetic by making sure they know pain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, do you not think that we have experienced ample amount of pain and loss over the course of this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do, I just hope that it was enough-- I just-- you know me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not a blood sacrifice, it's a tradition, it's meant to show us the world, and yes it's flawed and I want to fix that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is beautiful here, and I-- I look forward to leaving.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm very proud of you, but I will be on my guard, just in case.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think my traditions really vary that much from yours, which could still be perceived as old-fashioned, if you will?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Every farm boy in Whitestone, once he's old enough to talk and work, names an animal, raises it, and butchers it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, it's interesting, Percy, I've always looked at you and I as that opposites-attract conundrum. As my best friend, I feel like you are always the natural born leader who has been running away from it ever since I met you, and I'm the one who's not as naturally gifted, but is racing towards it faster than--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'm too cruel to lead. (sighs) Regardless, speaking of which, oh boy. Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have something to say. In a moment of panic, I may have influenced your decision to save Taryon from the kraken. I instantly regretted it-- not because of you, Taryon, I do apologise for that-- I instantly regretted it. It was a poor decision. I fully apologize, and if you wish to keep my glasses, I totally understand, and at the very least, if I have a swift punch in the face coming, I completely understand. I'm so sorry. And I wish I could say I would never do it again, but I honestly don't trust myself that much. But I am really, really sorry, and if anything had happened I would have run in to save you as best I could.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You look so, like, constipated right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did you influence my decision?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's-- I don't know, sometimes I can just be unnaturally convincing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the wrong hands, which are my hands on occasion. I felt bad. I feel bad. I feel like I did-- I was not a good-- I feel like I made a poor decision, and put you in peril, and subverted your free will. Does that make-- Uh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, Grog, recall as you guys were swimming up to Vesrah, and you were kind of following up to the path, you thought, why did I save Taryon?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, why did I save Taryon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because I'm a jerk. That's why you saved Taryon, 'cause I'm-- because I can be a bad friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm. What does that have to do with me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just am trying to be honest with you, because I respect you, and I would hate for you to think that-- I-- (sighs) Terrible at this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm not all right. I've made some bad decisions today and I've terrible thoughts and-- Ugh, I'm so tired.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How about we just say I owe you one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought you said I say I owe you one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'd just be owing each other forever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just-- Have some seashells... And a skipping rock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel better. That's all I needed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all I needed, I feel better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry, Percy, he makes it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) As Grog walks away with a skipping rock--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somewhere in the middle of all that serious talk, I've pulled my sister off to the side and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, when, so-- we used to do this as kids--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- and I lift her up in the air--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- with my feet holding her up--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- and I'm kind of in pain but I can kinda do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you even have strength for this right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right! I thought you meant in size.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are more ambitious than I am.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah. You know, we really need a break.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we're going to hell soon, literally-- But maybe after that, maybe we could take a break.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could you hear it on the other side?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When we were trying to bring you back, I kind of sort of-- And I come down off of his feet (laughs) and stand up--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I kind of, sort of promised her we would hunt down Orcus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do recall hearing those-- As she says this, you remember now the various things that were said, as the ritual's kinda coming to clarity. And you realize the immensity of the offer that was given.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I was trying to get you back. I know that is really hard and we probably are going to have a very hard time finding Orcus and killing him since he's like, you know, a god, I think--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, you're here now! (snaps fingers) I'm sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, man, no judgment, it means you're just like me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right? Stupid decisions to bring the people you love back to your side. Very stupid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck else are you gonna do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stupid to be a champion, stupid to kill Orcus, stupid all around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no! I just kind of said we'd go and do it. So, it could be, you know. Ah, I just said we would do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you know, in all seriousness, I have been waiting for something. I don't know what. But I'm not running towards it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She'll make sure we get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mine's connected to yours. Wherever you go, I go. Unless it's, you know--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start to cry a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear what sounds like a whip crack of thunder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- that it shatters into multiple pieces upon making contact with the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (slow claps) I can die happy now that I saw that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where'd you get that paper from?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have it in my bag.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm showing Pike the jewelry I'm bringing back. So, since I can't give it to you now, I'm just modeling it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a little hand thing, it's got some tie things.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (gasps) Percy, it's beautiful! I want it now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if that will go well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It will fall off of your form.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it sink through-- slowly through the Jello?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this is transpiring, you guys are brought in, food is prepared--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in my fancy clothes, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah, fair enough. You guys-- wherever you can, as you guys--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's still a little soggy and damp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the rest of the crew comes in, of the Drensala Vis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the prisoner? Is he still on board?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh yeah, no, we're leaving that fucker on the ship. We're not taking him here."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great, first light of the morning, let's get back."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, but the longer we're here, the more time we spend out wandering amongst the reef with "these people." And she glances around, and as you look around, you do see a very comparably bohemian lifestyle of the water ashari.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so glad you don't live in Los Villas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like Venice people? Like beachy hippies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like Labyrinth muppets, maybe. Like the creepy head Labyrinth muppets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah. Drinks are had, the party celebrates, and then eventually Uvenda begins to approach, and everyone gets quiet, and she walks up towards you, Keyleth, and reaches out to take your hand, both of your hands in hers. "In completing the trial of the water ashari, I impart "unto you now a gift. Something I, as far as I understand, have only been around long enough to "learn. But seeing the strength that you hold, perhaps you can wield this as well."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you see in your mind?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think of the goristro, Yenk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Imagine what it's like to be filled with strength, to be filled with the power. Envision "the horns, the snarl, the barrel-like fists." And you guys watch as Keyleth's form suddenly begins to shift and grow and where once was a half-elf Keyleth, you now see, towering above this tiny gnome, eyes still closed, a massive goristro.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone goes (gasps) and as her hands leave yours, you feel something shift and change and you hear the slightly more distant voice of Uvenda say, "Now open your eyes." And you look down--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no, she's fine. This is under her control."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This incantation is yours now. Be what you wish. Use these creatures."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (swoosh) You watch as all her body--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- a meaty mass with a singular eye and many eyestalks and you watch as everyone takes two steps back (gasps)--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can not do that now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is this?! What is this?! What the fuck?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am a golden god! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your shape is yours to change, Keyleth."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I change into-- adult bronze dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the beholder that's looking around excitedly suddenly shifts and grows two large bronze wings--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- claws emerge and the head extends.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But like, that's really big. How?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can she do the stuff they do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she like a dragon for real? Does anybody--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uvenda turns to you as you're shouting this, everyone's kinda watching her fly over, you can see the little bit of light that glows from the city occasionally reflect off the metallic underbody of the dragon as it circles overhead in the dark night sky. Uvenda turns to you and goes, "Ah yes. Don't worry. These forms are hers to control."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn and-- brass dragons have fire breath, right? Do they have fire breath?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do-- into the air, I just go (kwoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm gonna look this up real fast so the internet doesn't hate me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it is fire breath. So you watch as she flies off, she shoots forth this burning hot, bright jet of singular focused fire, not a napalm-level red dragon cone breath, but a singular focused beam of burning fire that just lights up all of Vesrah around. You see the hundreds of the denizens around go, "Oh!" as their faces glow against the dark sky around you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel far less nervous about this Orcus thing now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uvenda's just looking up and smiling, clasping her hands together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who needs a fucking magic carpet now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I come back down and I come down and I'm like (animal noises).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can't you talk as a dragon? Can't dragons talk?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so used to not being able to fucking talk!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's gesturing and I'm already climbing on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (animal noises) Oh she can change into a dragon but she's-- yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If I touch her, does she feel like a dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You feel the hard scales across her hide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey guys! Guys, check it out! Ah, Ah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like the idea that it's just like your regular-ass voice coming out of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm like, ah guys! Got little antlers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This went so FernGully so quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's Keyleth's voice but it's deeper, it's resonating, it quakes the sand on the ground near her when she speaks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck. What is this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should have completed your Aramente a lot sooner.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You wanna go for a ride?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (deep voice) I'm so happy right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, all right. I pick up the half-elves.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I did want to go. I want to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't let the jello fall apart.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's fine if I fall apart. It happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as the tinier folks step onto the back of Keyleth-dragon, they take off into the sky. You watch as a bunch of the children now begin to try and line up now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the parents are like, mm-hm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Grog forces himself to the front of the line--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- like palms a child and just pushes it back, like Old School, just (pff) out of the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I totally spend the next hour giving joy-rides to anyone who wants to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And yeah, most of the folks of Vesrah begin to start giving in to it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- taking dragon rides from Keyleth over the night sky (laughs).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and in fact, I'll go look at the logistics of this, but after that kraken battle, most everybody leveled up on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll send that out tonight via email to you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have Shapechange as one of a possible 9th-level spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can change into anything that's a challenge rating of my level or lower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An adult one. Not an ancient.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, still, adult dragon is like, right on par.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sighs) I wasn't sure if I was ever gonna get here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (heavy sigh) Yeah I can. It's for an hour and I can keep shapechanging into different things for an hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can whip those beholder eyes at people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you can do all the things that they can do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it at will or is it a random roll for which eye does what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like Beast Shape, so I keep my intellect, my wisdom, and my charisma, but I take on their physical stats--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And same thing, like you drop the shape's hit points and then it reverts back to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- or lair actions but you get all the rest of the abilities and physical attributes of the creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'd say that's pretty fucking sick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Forget about strawberry, how about raw-berry! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the night draws to a close--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As the spell fades, I just give Grog a big hug and just kinda cry tears of joy into his chest for a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And yeah, reverting back to your form, the party comes to an end. Uvenda comes up to you as you come back to your form and says, "I'm proud of you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, return to your people victorious. You achieved what your mother could not and her memory "lives on in you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will keep her-- Thanks. That's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good night." And she begins to walk off with her staff. You guys are able to rest for the evening, prepare yourselves for the following day's journey, however you wish that to be. So you get benefits of a long rest back. So you get half of your hit dice back, you are healed to full, you get your spells, you're good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you have so much fun, Grog?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, and thank you for not being-- somebody has to be all right. I mean, I'm fine, I'm fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wouldn't be here without you, or the others. You know that, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't do this alone and I-- To answer your question from yesterday, I think the problem of this Aramente is that it shows you the components of what you need to be a leader, but being a leader could take a lifetime to master. If you even can master such a thing. So lots still to go, this isn't the end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I hope you stay with me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we're not all going to make it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, let's at least go home for now. Is that okay? Is that enough for now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like once you can turn into a dragon, things only get more complicated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After she left our room to go find him, I start to suit up, and I'm looking in a full-length mirror at the new fucking kraken beak gouges down the front of me. And I notice that my two notes are out of place. So I'm going to shove them back into the folds that they're supposed to be in. And spend a couple minutes to button all the way up and leave the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's like real late, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't quite gone to bed yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus, that fight knocked you goofy, didn't it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have not been that close to death ever before. But I feel like in a way I learned something from the experience.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell me, I saw you up there fighting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were duking it out, you and me, 'til the very end of that fight and well, as one seasoned warrior to another--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have any tips? Any notes for me? Any thoughts to improve my warfare skills? Should I move more? Should I think of cool one-liners to yell out as I hit my enemies?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, yeah. That always helps. Right? Someone like you, I would probably stay on the outside. You got a little in the crunch zone, right? You seem to have a good range on your weapons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, yes, but my rod is best at close-up action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Most rods are good close-up but, you know, if you could stay on the outside with it, maybe you'll have better success? But, I wanted to give you something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's like a last resort, right? Cause you went like eee! And it was not good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: TRAVIS:So I want to give you a magic egg. And I reach into the bag of holding and I take out a basilisk egg that I have no fucking idea how old it is. But, it's in there. There are six of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This egg is very, very special.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about this big and the outside of it has this very layered stone look to it. Almost like when plates shift and you watch old sediment stone stick out. And you can see the different types of stone layers, geologically. It's that kind of a texture down the side of it and it's like a dark gray, almost blue color.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This egg comes from a very ancient magical beast. If you find yourself in a dire need. Like in that last fight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you break it and consume its contents, you will be granted immense power.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. But only in times of great need. I trust I don't have to emphasize how important that is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so proud of you, Travis. However this goes, I'm so proud of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A magical egg of power. To be consumed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a Kinder Egg. There's a toy inside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Except it's full of sulfurous shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Since you like to sail so much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is Doty, Dottie, his robot around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But, after a bit of trading some tales about a few interesting at-sea endeavors, you guys get along swimmingly and it's a fast friendship between you and Captain Adella.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to go over to Tary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Taryon, after you're granted this majestic egg, as you're walking back to your homestead, the glowing gnome approaches you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello again. I have a request of your robot. Your Doty. Am I saying this right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could he draw some things for me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In Gnome, I say, absolutely m'lady. Whatever you would request.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And in Common, I say back, thank you so much. Doty, would you mind drawing portraits for me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do whatever the young lady asks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a little bit of a note, here. He doesn't know who any of those people are.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So the people that I point to. Could you just draw each of them please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone's kind of scattered to the four winds right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll help you point them out to Doty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you point out to where they're all staying and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're gathering up anyway. We're walking over.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When you're all done, just bring them to me. Thank you so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any particular style you'd like them to be drawn in?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I say, thank you, in Gnomish. In Gnome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as you all go to rest for the evening, Pike, the granted presence here through Sarenrae's will begins to withdraw. Her strength through the divine gate to keep you in this, seemingly drained. You sense that you'll be returning back to Emon until you're retrieved by your allies here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you'll only have a short time. As the rest of you guys go to rest for the evening and you all go to sleep, Percy, Keyleth, Vax, Vex, and Grog, I need you guys to roll perception checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just doing this all night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we going Gil? Yeah. Don't fuck me, Gil.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! I'm going with that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't get to negate that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No I'm going with my first one. You don't get to negate my roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going with my first roll because he's a jerk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What was the first one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your friends all rolled with Gil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One, by one, by one, by one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not dreaming. I'm not dreaming.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does anyone try to talk to the automaton?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we'd just stay perfectly still?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And try and lift our chin and push forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 'Til it looks like a good angle, at least.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I slowly pull the sheet up--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Doty continues sketching, adjusting to the new positions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Moves an adjacent piece of paper next to it and keeps going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keeps taping them on. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, for the sake of narrative of this, the energy will carry you through to the morning.

lines.name: MATT
